name: My Sheep Hero
description:
'My Sheep Hero' is a 3D low poly casual adventure game where you the player is out in the countryside to help your grandfather

find all 7 of his sheep who have disappeared. The land is huge from mountains to forests, the sheep have lost their way.

"Hey bud, do you think you can help me out?"

A short phone call leads you back to a familiar place, fresh air, calm atmosphere, and a 

bunch of lost sheep...?

"They're only sheep, leave it to me!"

How hard could it be to find 7 sheep in the wilderness, right?

Some strange creatures await your arrival as well as the sheep wait for you to save them.

Music Credits ♪ 

Title - Donut (Prod. by Lukrembo)

In Game - Naptime! - Bgm President

Win - Inside Out by Chillpeach

Lose - Touch - Mattia Cupelli | NEW VERSION 2019
